diagnosis_as_pft1. Gold Standard Diagnosis4. Disease Severity: Has the patient had pulmonary function testing within the past 3 months?0..1choiceOptions: 3 options

Options: 5 options

diagnosis_as_etiology_otherOther, Please specify0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_as_etiology = 'other'
diagnosis_as_etiology_auto_immuneAuto-immune or granulomatous disease Subcategory0..1choiceEnable When: diagnosis_as_etiology = 'autoImmune'
Options: 3 options

  • diagnosis_as_ds = 'subglotticStenosis'

Options: 4 options

  • diagnosis_as_ds = 'subglotticStenosis'
  • diagnosis_as_ds = 'trachealStenosis'

Options: 4 options

diagnosis_as_ds_agwAnterior Glottic Web classification (Cohen)0..1choiceEnable When: diagnosis_as_ds_bvfi_gs = 'anteriorGlotticWeb'
Options: 4 options
diagnosis_as_ds_cc_refAnterior Glottic Web classification (Cohen) Picture for reference0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_as_ds_bvfi_gs = 'anteriorGlotticWeb'
diagnosis_as_ds_acGrade of Stenosis (Aziz Classification of Supraglottic Stenosis)0..1choiceEnable When: diagnosis_as_ds = 'supraglotticStenosis'

diagnosis_as_ds_mluasPlease describe levels and severity of stenosis involved0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_as_ds = 'multilevelUpperAirwayStenosis'
diagnosis_as_ds_odsHow would you subjectively classify the overall degree of stenosis?0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
diagnosis_as_ds_epsHow would you subjectively estimate the percent of stenosis from 0 to 100?0..1string
diagnosis_as_treatment5. Treatment obtained: What treatment has the patient undergone for their stenosis?0..1string
diagnosis_as_treatment_surgerySurgery options0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_as_treatment = '1'
diagnosis_as_treatment_surgery_otherOther Surgery option, Please Specify0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_as_treatment_surgery = '1'
diagnosis_as_treatment_in_officeIn-office/awake treatment options0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_as_treatment = '1'

Documentation for this format

Options Sets

Answer options for diagnosis_as_pft

  • No
  • Yes
  • Not certain

Answer options for diagnosis_as_gsd

  • No
  • Yes
  • Not certain

Answer options for diagnosis_as_ds

  • Subglottic Stenosis
  • Bilateral Vocal fold immobility or Glottic Stenosis
  • Supraglottic Stenosis
  • Tracheal Stenosis
  • Multi-Level Upper Airway Stenosis

Answer options for diagnosis_as_ds_bvfi_gs

  • Posterior Glottic Stenosis
  • Bilateral Vocal Fold Paralysis
  • Anterior glottic Web
  • Not certain or TBD
  • Other

Answer options for diagnosis_as_etiology

  • Not certain or TBD
  • Iatrogenic (surgery or intubation)
  • Idiopathic
  • Auto-immune or granulomatous disease
  • Radiation
  • GERD
  • Caustic Injury or Inhalation Injury
  • Infectious (Diphtheria TB Bacterial Tracheitis other)
  • Other

Answer options for diagnosis_as_etiology_auto_immune

  • Granulomatosis with polyangiitis (GPA) (Formerly known as Wegner's disease)
  • Relapsing Polychondritis
  • Other

Answer options for diagnosis_as_ds_mcg

  • Grade I
  • Grade II
  • Grade III
  • Grade IV

Answer options for diagnosis_as_ds_bc

  • (a) Class 1
  • (b) Class 2
  • (c) Class 3
  • (d) Class 4

Answer options for diagnosis_as_ds_agw

  • Grade 1 (0-35% obstruction)
  • Grade 2 (35-50% obstruction)
  • Grade 3 (51-75% obstruction)
  • Grade 4 (76-100% obstruction)

Answer options for diagnosis_as_ds_ac

  • Grade 1
  • Grade 2
  • Grade 3
  • Grade 4
  • Unsure

Answer options for diagnosis_as_ds_ac_grade_4

  • Grade 4T
  • Grade 4G
  • Grade 4TG

Answer options for diagnosis_as_ds_ods

  • Mild
  • Moderate
  • Severe
